metadata.title: CognitiveTrace
metadata.description: Intuitive test to evaluate scattered attention through stimulus tasks. Clear results in minutes.

hero.title: Evaluate your attention with stimuli
hero.description: CognitiveTrace is an intuitive test that detects signs of scattered attention through short and simple tasks. Clear results in minutes.

stimulusTests.title: Stimulus tests
stimulusTests.description: Short stimulus response tasks to measure focus and consistency.

clearResults.title: Clear results
clearResults.description: Simple metrics: reaction time, accuracy and variability.

uxDesign.title: UX-centered design
uxDesign.description: Simple and intuitive interface to minimize cognitive friction.

multiDevice.title: Multi-device
multiDevice.description: Works on desktop and mobile without installation.

scientificValidation.title: Scientific Foundation
scientificValidation.description: Our evaluations are backed by scientifically validated methodologies to accurately measure cognitive abilities.

sart.name: SART Task
sart.description: Measures the ability to maintain sustained attentional focus and detect attention lapses in real time, evaluating consistency in stimulus response.

stroopFlanker.name: Stroop and Flanker
stroopFlanker.description: Evaluate inhibitory control and the ability to resist interference from distracting stimuli, measuring reaction time to cognitive conflicts.

nBack.name: N-Back Task
nBack.description: Analyzes working memory, information retention and the ability to update attentional focus under different cognitive loads.

pvt.name: PVT Task
pvt.description: Records reaction times and variability in attentional processing, being a sensitive indicator of mental fatigue.

preparation.title: 1. Preparation
preparation.description: Find a quiet place and make sure you have sound if necessary.

stimulusTasks.title: 2. Stimulus tasks
stimulusTasks.description: Respond to visual or auditory stimuli as quickly and accurately as possible.

results.title: 3. Results
results.description: Get key metrics and a clear interpretation of your attention.

cta.title: Ready to evaluate your attention
cta.description: Start now. The test takes less than 5 minutes.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about CognitiveTrace

whatIs.question: What is CognitiveTrace?
whatIs.answer: CognitiveTrace is a cognitive assessment tool that uses stimulus-response tasks to measure aspects of attention such as focus, consistency, and responsiveness. It is based on scientifically validated methodologies.

howLong.question: How long does it take to complete the test?
howLong.answer: The complete test takes approximately 5-10 minutes. It includes several short tasks designed to evaluate different aspects of your attention without causing fatigue.

needRegistration.question: Do I need to register to use CognitiveTrace?
needRegistration.answer: No, you don't need to register. You can start the test immediately from your browser. Results are shown at the end of each session.

accuracy.question: How accurate are the results?
accuracy.answer: The results are based on scientifically validated methodologies such as SART, Stroop, Flanker, N-Back, and PVT. However, for clinical diagnoses always consult with a healthcare professional.

dataPrivacy.question: What happens to my data?
dataPrivacy.answer: Your assessment data is processed locally on your device when possible. We do not store personally identifiable information without your explicit consent.

preparation.question: How do I prepare for the test?
preparation.answer: Find a quiet place, make sure you have sound available, and dedicate a few minutes without interruptions. No special prior preparation is needed.

retake.question: Can I retake the test?
retake.answer: Yes, you can retake the test as many times as you want. However, we recommend waiting at least a few hours between sessions for more representative results.

modeSelection.title: Cognitive Tests
modeSelection.description: Choose how you want to take the cognitive tests: all sequentially for a complete assessment, or access the dashboard to take them individually.

sequential.title: Complete Assessment
sequential.content: Take all cognitive tests one after another to get a complete assessment of your cognitive performance. Includes SART, Flanker, N-Back and PVT.

dashboard.title: Individual Dashboard
dashboard.content: Access the dashboard to choose and take specific tests according to your needs. Perfect for training particular cognitive skills.

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.complete: Complete Assessment: Ideal for getting a complete cognitive profile
recommendations.individual: Individual Dashboard: Perfect for training specific skills
recommendations.environment: Find a quiet environment free from distractions
recommendations.connection: Make sure you have a stable internet connection

sequential.title: Cognitive Test Battery
sequential.description: You will take 4 cognitive tests sequentially. Each test evaluates different aspects of your cognitive performance.

instructions.title: General Instructions
instructions.environment: Environment: Find a quiet place without distractions
instructions.focus: Concentration: Maintain focus throughout the sequence
instructions.breaks: Breaks: There will be brief pauses between tests
instructions.results: Results: You will get a complete report at the end

results.title: Cognitive Assessment Results
results.description: You have completed all cognitive tests. Here is a complete summary of your performance.

overallScore.title: Overall Score
overallScore.description: Score based on accuracy and response speed

summary.title: Summary and Recommendations
summary.maintainPractice: Maintain regular practice to improve consistency

continueAssessment.title: Continue Your Assessment
continueAssessment.description: Complete these remaining tests for a comprehensive evaluation

allComplete.title: Assessment Complete!
allComplete.description: You have completed all available cognitive tests
